visualization_prompt: Create a Highcharts chartOptions object to render a spline chart with the title 'Monthly Average Temperature'. The chart should have styled axes and labels with specific colors and font sizes. The data series should represent monthly temperature data with a custom color scheme. Additionally, configure the chart with specific margins, background, and legend settings.
visualization_explanation: The provided Highcharts chartOptions object configures a spline chart with the title 'Monthly Average Temperature'. The chart type is set to 'spline', and it includes a custom background color and specific margins for better visual appeal. The x-axis represents months with labels displayed every two months, styled with a specific color and font size. The y-axis represents temperature in degrees Celsius, also with styled labels and titles. The data series includes monthly temperature data with a custom color. The legend is enabled and styled to match the overall theme of the chart. This configuration ensures a visually appealing and informative chart.
